articles.description: Gautam Gambhir, who played a crucial 97-run knock final in the 2011 ODI WC final, pointed out the contributions of his teammates that didn't get noticed.
articles.content: Gautam Gambhir has again expressed his displeasure at the hero worship in Indian cricket. Gambhir, who played a vital role in Indias 2007 World Twenty20 and 2011 ODI World Cup triumphs, pointed out t… [+3231 chars]

articles.title: Umesh Yadav signs with Essex for County Championship run-in - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He replaces Doug Bracewell and will be available for home clashes against Middlesex and Hampshire and an away game against Northamptonshire
articles.content: NewsHe replaces Doug Bracewell and will be available for home clashes against Middlesex and Hampshire and an away game against Northamptonshire

articles.title: Durand Cup 2023: NorthEast United FC reach semi-final after a narrow win over the Indian Army - Indian Super League
articles.description: Phalguni Singh’s strike in the second-half made all the difference as NorthEast United FC pipped Indian Army by a goal to nil in the first quart-final of the 2023 Durand Cup at the Indira Gandhi Athletic Stadium in Guwahati on Thursday.
